greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Dirichlet convolution of triangular numbers with themselves.
link: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: Sum_{k=1..n} a(k) ~ n^3*(log(n)/12 + (6*gamma - 1 + Pi^2)/36), where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant A001620. (End)
program: (MAGMA) A000217:=func<i | i*(i+1)/2>; [&+[A000217(d)*A000217(n div d): d in Divisors(n)]: n in [1..50]]; // Bruno Berselli, Feb 11 2014
results.author: _Erich Friedman_
